H0.text: Cardiovascular is the system whose blood vessels are similar to the lymph vessels that make up the lymphatic circulatory system.

H1.text: Nervous is the system whose blood vessels form a circulatory system similar to the one made up of lymph vessels.

H2.text: Cardiac is the system whose blood vessels are similar to the lymph vessels that make up a lymphatic circulatory system.

H3.text: Gastrointestinal vessels make up a circulatory system similar to the lymph vessels.

A4.text: The general structure of lymphatics is based on that of blood vessels.

A5.text: Lymph vessels are structured like blood vessels.
